title: ChatGPT and Google Assistant as a Source of Patient Education for Patients With Amblyopia: Content Analysis
details: G Wu, DA Lee, W Zhao, A Wong, R Jhangiani… - Journal of Medical Internet …, 2024
abstract: Background We queried ChatGPT (OpenAI) and Google Assistant about amblyopia and compared their answers with the keywords found on the American Association for Pediatric Ophthalmology and Strabismus (AAPOS) website, specifically the …
